説明: Just a stick made of oak wood.
Magical longsword clothed in flames.
A toy replica of the holy sword. Feel like a superhero.
Metal claws that penetrate dragon scales.
A magnificent large sword with form and function.
A type of sword called a Katana which is imported from the eastern country of Hinomoto. Terrifyingly sharp.
A legendary holy sword created from the trunk of the World Tree. This nifty item is light and cuts well.
A sturdy staff make of cypress. Just right for apprentice witches.
A heavy wand with an iron tip. It also hurts if you're hit with it.
A wand with a hint of mana. Increases magical power.
Extravagantly decorated silver wand.
A staff that is said to have been used by a famous wise man. It's powerful either way.
The finest wand made of gold.
A wand used by witches of the Wilket school - a school of witches with a long history. It is made by wood from the world tree.
Fan carefully finished with cypress. Mostly decorative.
A sturdy steel fan of military grade. Typically reserved for generals.
A military fan depicting the god who controls the wind. Bring a tailwind to your army.
You feel like an overlord just by holding it in your hand. The general who gets this becomes bold and violent.
Fan made of pure gold. It sells for a high price.
Bangles with witches' magic.
Bangles made of pure gold. They sell for a high price.
A vicious cursed bangle. Your personality will turn for the worse if you put it on.
A broom commonly used by witches to fly. It has just a little bit of magic.
A broom made of pure gold. It sells for a high price.
A bell that is said to ward off demons. So what happens if a witch puts it on? Don't ask.
Headband that all muscleheads want to buy. Makes you look tougher.
A mysterious magic book that grants you knowledge of magic just by holding it.

A simple robe of dark blue color. Good anti-magic performance in case of magical mishap.
A high-class robe worn by a full-fledged witch. Enchanted to amplify magic.
Carton's favorite golden armor. It's only gold plated...the metal underneath is more practical.
A type of armor called Katchu imported from the eastern country Hinomoto. It is carefully crafted and luxuriously designed.
The armor of some knightly order. Very heavy.
A robe worn by the head of the illustrious Lorraine school. Made using the Demon King's pet spider's thread spun using high-concentration mana water.
A love letter of an anxious girl. I'm kind of happy to have it.
An angel in white who heals the soldiers. Resilience increases each turn.
Delicious looking baked fish. Chisha's favorite food. The smell is amazing.
A nondescript cleaning tool. Maybe it's not even for sale.
A hat worn by the head of the historic Lorraine school for witches. You can sense overwhelming magical power.
The vampire Megadeath-chan is the protagonist of a popular fantasy novel in the city. Is it just something sold at a souvenir shop...?
Not a poison apple...but an apple that gives you magical powers when you eat it.
Embarassing panties. Almost just a string.
Deep red gemstone. A concentration of high density.
A drink that increases physical strength.
Proof of belonging to the Wilket faction. Increases magic attack power slightly.
Emits a mysterious light. It has such powerful magic that just having it gives you power.
